//Declare 2 float variables and display their sum.
public class FloatSum {			

	public static void main(String[] args) {
		// TODO Auto-generated method stub
		//Declare two float variables 
		
		float floatVar1 = 5.3f; //the f at the end denotes the float literal
		float floatVar2 =3.0f;
		
		// calculate their sum
		
		float sumResult = floatVar1 + floatVar2;
		// Display the sum
		
	    System.out.println("The sum of " + floatVar1 +" and " + floatVar2 + " is:" + sumResult);
		

	}

}


Output:
The sum of 5.3 and 3.0 is:8.3
